(Stay in my corner)
You make me so proud, stay darling
Please, stay

How I love you

(Stay, stay, stay, stay)

(Stay in my corner)

And I will never, never let you down
Just say you'll stay
(Stay in my corner)
'Cause I'll need you always around

i guess you meant more than i realized
the love we had stays on my mind
